<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Stalwart Mind](/Feats.aspx?ID=3449) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Mammoth Lord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3443)

**Trigger**
You fail a Will save.

</column>

---

When necessary to avoid a magical compulsion or curse, you can be as stubborn as your megafauna companion. Attempt a new Will save against the triggering effect.
name: Stalwart Mind
